events.message: Don't access out of bounds array entry array[sizeof(array)]

rename.from: Don't access out of bounds array index: array[sizeof(array)]
rename.to: tests: Don't access out of bounds array index: array[sizeof(array)]

events.body: Can you explain how this is oob?

@MarcoFalke arrays of defined size N are bounded from 0 to N-1, while these index at N. Not directly harmful as only the addresses are taken, but invalid in the sense that they exceed the deined bounds. Suggested by @practicalswift here: https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/13525#discussion_r217763381
